___sources.description: The raw sources for this resource.
___sources.title: Sources

___path.context: Implementations need to negotiate the type of path provided, and dereference the data accordingly.
___path.description: A fully qualified URL, or a POSIX file path..
___path.title: Path

___profile.context: Every Package and Resource descriptor has a profile. The default profile, if none is declared, is `data-package` for Package and `data-resource` for Resource.
___profile.title: Profile

___name.context: This is ideally a url-usable and human-readable name. Name `SHOULD` be invariant, meaning it `SHOULD NOT` change when its parent descriptor is updated.
___name.description: An identifier string. Lower case characters with `.`, `_`, `-` and `/` are allowed.
___name.title: Name

___mediatype.description: The media type of this resource. Can be any valid media type listed with [IANA](https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml).
___mediatype.title: Media Type

___encoding.description: The file encoding of this resource.
___encoding.title: Encoding

___format.description: The file format of this resource.
___format.title: Format

___description.description: A text description. Markdown is encouraged.
___description.title: Description

___licenses.context: This property is not legally binding and does not guarantee that the package is licensed under the terms defined herein.
___licenses.description: The license(s) under which the resource is published.
___licenses.title: Licenses

items.context: Use of this property does not imply that the person was the original creator of, or a contributor to, the data in the descriptor, but refers to the composition of the descriptor itself.
items.title: License

___name.description: MUST be an Open Definition license identifier, see http://licenses.opendefinition.org/
___name.title: Open Definition license identifier

___path.context: Implementations need to negotiate the type of path provided, and dereference the data accordingly.
___path.description: A fully qualified URL, or a POSIX file path..
___path.title: Path

___bytes.description: The size of this resource in bytes.
___bytes.title: Bytes

___hash.description: The MD5 hash of this resource. Indicate other hashing algorithms with the {algorithm}:{hash} format.
___hash.title: Hash

___homepage.description: The home on the web that is related to this data package.
___homepage.title: Home Page

oneOf.description: A fully qualified URL, or a POSIX file path..
oneOf.title: Path

items.title: Path

___path.context: The dereferenced value of each referenced data source in `path` `MUST` be commensurate with a native, dereferenced representation of the data the resource describes. For example, in a *Tabular* Data Resource, this means that the dereferenced value of `path` `MUST` be an array.
___path.description: A reference to the data for this resource, as either a path as a string, or an array of paths as strings. of valid URIs.
___path.title: Path
